description: This file defines the NotesProvider class, which manages the state and operations for notes within the application, including CRUD operations, filtering, and notifying listeners for UI updates.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages a list of notes, providing methods to load, add, update, delete, and filter notes, notifying listeners on changes.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Asynchronously loads all notes from the database and updates the internal notes list, then notifies listeners.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to the database, then reloads notes from the database.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database, then reloads notes.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID from the database, then reloads notes.

methods.name: getFilteredNotes
methods.description: Returns a list of notes filtered by a search query and/or tag, with sorting based on modification date.
